attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I strongly suggest that National Service is re-introduced. the points in favour are:
Young people without disciplined, will receive it and learn to obey LAWS and RULES.
Education in chosen trades can be followed in a more 'adult' environment.
Those who want to use guns, will be taught how and when to use them with the respect they deserve.
Excess energies will be channeled.
and a more responsible attitude will evolve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
